data.description: Position Overview The Integrations Intern will play a vital role in connecting disparate software systems and APIs, ensuring a seamless and efficient flow of data across the organization. This position offers a unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in developing and maintaining critical integrations that drive business processes and improve data accessibility. The intern will work closely with the Integrations, Enterprise Architecture & Data Analytics team, collaborating with software engineers, data analysts, and architects to define integration requirements, troubleshoot issues, and contribute to the overall success of our integration initiatives. This position is based out of the Whippany, New Jersey office. The pay rate for this role is $25/hr. Key Accountabilities: - Assist in connecting various software systems, applications, and APIs to enable seamless and secure data exchange across the organization. - Contribute to the development, and troubleshooting of integ...
